Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.views.productDisplay

Class ProductDisplay

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.views.View
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.views.productDisplay.ProductDisplay
Direct Known Subclasses:
BookOrManualDisplay, ITProductDisplay, LearningResourceDisplay, OfficeEquipmentDisplay, StationeryArticleDisplay
public abstract class ProductDisplay extends View
The ProductDisplay class is an abstract class responsible for displaying information about a product in the CLI application. It serves as the base class for specific product display implementations and provides common functionality for rendering product details and actions.

The class extends the View class.

The class includes methods for rendering product information and actions such as toggling likes, displaying reviews, and adding products to the cart. The rendering is done through interaction with the ShopController and related data classes.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductDisplay

      public ProductDisplay(UUID productId, ShopController shopController, ProfileController profileController)
      Constructs a new ProductDisplay with the specified product ID, shop controller, and profile controller. This serves as the base constructor for all classes extending ProductDisplay. It initializes the unique identifier of the product, the shop controller, and the profile controller for further use.
      Parameters:
      productId - The unique identifier of the product.
      shopController - The controller responsible for shop-related actions.
      profileController - The controller responsible for profile-related actions.

  • Method Details

    • renderProductInfo

      public void renderProductInfo(Product product)
      Renders the common product information shared by all products. Displays details such as title, likes, rating, description, category, sub-category, price, bonus fidelity points, promotional discount, promotional bonus fidelity points, promotional end date, seller, and commercialization date.
      Parameters:
      product - The product for which to render information.

    • renderProductActions

      public boolean renderProductActions(Product product)
      Renders the product-specific actions menu, allowing the user to perform actions such as toggling likes, displaying reviews, and adding to the cart. This method serves as a central point for rendering actions based on the user type (Buyer or Seller) and delegates to specific methods accordingly.
      Parameters:
      product - The product for which to render actions.
      Returns:
      true if the rendering was successful and the user chose an action, false otherwise.

    • displayBuyerActions

      public boolean displayBuyerActions(Product product)
      Displays buyer-specific actions for a given product, such as toggling likes, displaying reviews, and adding to the cart.
      Parameters:
      product - The product for which to display buyer actions.
      Returns:
      True if the action was successfully performed; false otherwise.

    • displaySellerActions

      public boolean displaySellerActions(Product product)
      Displays seller-specific actions for a given product, such as displaying reviews and starting a promotion.
      Parameters:
      product - The product for which to display seller actions.
      Returns:
      True if the action was successfully performed; false otherwise.
